title: STEM Integrated Education Design Through Meteorological Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen pre-service teachers’ competency in designing weather phenomenon-based STEM lessons applicable in the field. Develops immersive instructional methods in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: They can cultivate the ability to analyze and visualize regional weather patterns using Mesonet data.
They can design a lesson plan for exploring weather phenomena by applying a place-based problem-solving approach.
They can propose strategies to enhance scientific thinking through data-driven decision-making processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
